Author: lilmisssuccubus
Text: This straight up happened to me this past weekend. Drank it at 4 so it would hit in the morning before work....was trapped in the bathroom at 8 pm with my fiancés best friend in the next room visiting.

Author: BladderPatrol
Text: Woof I feel you. The way my body reacts to that is so spotty. I used to take it around 8pm to help me at 7am. Worked for a while but then it wouldn’t ‘kick in’ till 10 or 11am while I was at work.   I got the genius idea to take it at 4pm at work so it would kick in around 7am! Smarty pants was wrong, I got trapped on the toilet at my house at 8pm while I was expecting guests.
